body_html:
@waynesuzq is correct, stream callbacks are not supported. I'm working on an MPS compatible PR.
…
On Wed, Jul 5, 2017 at 10:40 AM waynesuzq ***@***.***> wrote: @eth-n <https://github.com/eth-n> Hi, quoting from MPS guide book: "Stream callbacks are not supported. Calling any stream callback APIs will return an error." Do you think this is the reason for Tensorflow not working? I tried caffe, it works well. But I just take a guess, coz I didn't really read through the code. Thanks for the reply. — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub <#9080 (comment)>, or mute the thread <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AAuzrA_tSfwv32IOwc6bFRPGKwxznThzks5sKz3YgaJpZM4M3_K2> .

body:
@waynesuzq is correct, stream callbacks are not supported. I'm working on
an MPS compatible PR.
On Wed, Jul 5, 2017 at 10:40 AM waynesuzq <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> @eth-n <https://github.com/eth-n> Hi, quoting from MPS guide book:
> "Stream callbacks are not supported. Calling any stream callback APIs will
> return an error."
> Do you think this is the reason for Tensorflow not working? I tried caffe,
> it works well. But I just take a guess, coz I didn't really read through
> the code. Thanks for the reply.
>
> —
